text: The Two Who Stole the Moon () is a 1962 Polish fantasy movie directed by Jan Batory and was based on the 1928 book of the same name by Kornel Makuszyński. It stars Lech Kaczyński, Jarosław Kaczyński, Ludwik Benoit, Helena Grossówna, Janusz Strachocki, Wacław Kowalski, Michał Szewczyk. The film's two child stars, twin brothers Lech and Jarosław Kaczyński, later became major politicians as adults: Lech was the President of Poland between 2005 and 2010, while Jarosław was the Prime Minister of Poland between 2006 and 2007. ==Other websites== * Category:1962 fantasy movies Category:Polish movies Category:Movies based on books
title: The Two Who Stole the Moon
